name: Foot Worship
descrip: Give in to your desire to worship and grovel at the feet trampling your body. Recoils intensely from worshiping. This is an Indulgent skill
outcome: [AttackerName] licks and caresses the foot of the woman dominating [AttackerHimOrHer]. [TargetName] revels in watching as [AttackerName] fervently worships [TargetHisOrHer] foot, and playfully presses her foot against the mouth of [AttackerName]
miss: [AttackerName] worshipfully kisses at [TargetName]'s foot as it dominates [AttackerHisOrHer] face, but it seems like [TargetName] is too busy plotting [TargetHisOrHer] next move to enjoy [AttackerHisOrHer]'s worship.
